mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_PROJECT_NO.NEXTVAL AS no FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PROJECT(NO, CATEGORY_NO, MEMBER_NO, TITLE) VALUES (#{no}, #{categoryNo}, #{memberNo}, #{title})
mapper.select: SELECT P.NO AS NO , P.STATUS_NO AS STATUS_NO , P.CATEGORY_NO AS CATEGORY_NO , C.MAIN_CATEGORY_NO AS MAIN_CATEGORY_NO , C.SUB_CATEGORY_NO AS SUB_CATEGORY_NO , C.MAIN_CATEGORY AS MAIN_CATEGORY , C.SUB_CATEGORY AS SUB_CATEGORY , P.MEMBER_NO AS MEMBER_NO , M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME , P.TITLE AS TITLE , P.GOAL_AMOUNT AS GOAL_AMOUNT , P.IMAGE_URL AS IMAGE_URL , P.TXT_DESCRIPTION AS TXT_DESCRIPTION , P.TXT_BUDGET AS TXT_BUDGET , P.TXT_SCHEDULE AS TXT_SCHEDULE , P.TXT_TEAM AS TXT_TEAM , P.TXT_ITEM AS TXT_ITEM , P.CURRENT_AMOUNT AS CURRENT_AMOUNT , P.OK_YN AS OK_YN , P.OK_DATE AS OK_DATE , P.ENROLL_DATE AS ENROLL_DATE , P.START_DATE AS START_DATE , P.END_DATE AS END_DATE , P.CAL_DATE AS CAL_DATE , P.DELETE_YN AS DELETE_YN FROM PROJECT P JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN CATEGORY C ON P.CATEGORY_NO = C.NO WHERE P.NO = #{no} AND P.DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT C.MAIN_CATEGORY, C.SUB_CATEGORY, P.TITLE, P.IMAGE_URL FROM PROJECT P JOIN CATEGORY C ON C.NO = P.CATEGORY_NO WHERE P.NO = #{no} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT , REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(TO_CHAR(GOAL_AMOUNT)), '(\d{3})', '\1,')), '^,', '') AS GOAL_AMOUNT , TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE , TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE FROM PROJECT WHERE NO = #{no} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT TXT_DESCRIPTION, TXT_BUDGET, TXT_SCHEDULE, TXT_TEAM, TXT_ITEM FROM PROJECT WHERE NO = #{no} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REWARD(NO, PROJECT_NO, AMOUNT, NAME) VALUES(SEQ_REWARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{projectNo}, #{amount}, #{name})
mapper.update: MERGE INTO SETTLEMENT_INFO target USING ( SELECT #{projectNo} AS PROJECT_NO , #{bankName} AS BANK_NAME , #{name} AS NAME , #{accountNum} AS ACCOUNT_NUM FROM dual ) source ON (target.PROJECT_NO = source.PROJECT_NO) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET target.BANK_NAME = source.BANK_NAME , target.NAME = source.NAME , target.ACCOUNT_NUM = source.ACCOUNT_NUM WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( NO , PROJECT_NO , BANK_NAME , NAME , ACCOUNT_NUM ) VALUES ( SEQ_SETTLEMENT_INFO_NO.NEXTVAL , source.PROJECT_NO , source.BANK_NAME , source.NAME , source.ACCOUNT_NUM )
